languages.text: "Слуга смерти, зрящий за грань! Паук, что оплетает кокон в конце своей нити!" {n}Идира трясет головой и хватается за виски.{/n} "П-простите, что-то накрыло. Я же ничего такого не сказала, да?"

traits.locale_text: "Слуга смерти, зрящий за грань! Паук, что оплетает кокон в конце своей нити!" {n}Идира трясет головой и хватается за виски.{/n} "П-простите, что-то накрыло. Я же ничего такого не сказала, да?"

languages.text: "A servant of death who sees beyond the threshold! A spider who spins a cocoon at the end of his thread!" {n}Idira shakes her head and clutches her temples.{/n} "S-sorry about that, it just came over me. I didn't say anything too weird, did I?"
languages.original_text: "Слуга смерти, зрящий за грань! Паук, что оплетает кокон в конце своей нити!" {n}Идира трясет головой и хватается за виски.{/n} "П-простите, что-то накрыло. Я же ничего такого не сказала, да?"

"A servant of death who sees beyond the threshold! A spider who spins a cocoon at the end of his thread!" {n}Idira shakes her head and clutches her temples.{/n} "S-sorry about that, it just came over me. I didn't say anything too weird, did I?"

languages.text: «¡Un{mf||a} sirvient{mf|e|a} de la muerte que ve más allá del umbral! ¡Una araña que teje un capullo al final de su hilo!». {n}Idira sacude la cabeza y se aprieta las sienes.{/n} «P... perdón, se me ha venido a la cabeza. ¿No habré dicho nada muy raro?».
languages.original_text: "A servant of death who sees beyond the threshold! A spider who spins a cocoon at the end of his thread!" {n}Idira shakes her head and clutches her temples.{/n} "S-sorry about that, it just came over me. I didn't say anything too weird, did I?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Un{mf||a} sirvient{mf|e|a} de la muerte que ve más allá del umbral! ¡Una araña que teje un capullo al final de su hilo!». {n}Idira sacude la cabeza y se aprieta las sienes.{/n} «P... perdón, se me ha venido a la cabeza. ¿No habré dicho nada muy raro?».

languages.text: 「敷居の向こうを見る、死の従者！糸の果てに繭を紡ぐ蜘蛛！」{n}イディラは頭を振り、こめかみを押さえた。{/n}「ご、ごめんなさい。突然頭の中によぎってしまい。あまり変な事は言っていないよね？」
languages.original_text: "A servant of death who sees beyond the threshold! A spider who spins a cocoon at the end of his thread!" {n}Idira shakes her head and clutches her temples.{/n} "S-sorry about that, it just came over me. I didn't say anything too weird, did I?"

traits.locale_text: 「敷居の向こうを見る、死の従者！糸の果てに繭を紡ぐ蜘蛛！」{n}イディラは頭を振り、こめかみを押さえた。{/n}「ご、ごめんなさい。突然頭の中によぎってしまい。あまり変な事は言っていないよね？」

languages.text: “死亡的仆人，她的目光越过了生与死的门槛！在旅途的终点，这只蜘蛛会迎来结茧的命运！”{n}伊迪拉摇了摇头，捂住了太阳穴。{/n}“抱……抱歉，那些话突然就冲口而出了，我应该没说什么太奇怪的话吧？”
languages.original_text: "A servant of death who sees beyond the threshold! A spider who spins a cocoon at the end of his thread!" {n}Idira shakes her head and clutches her temples.{/n} "S-sorry about that, it just came over me. I didn't say anything too weird, did I?"

traits.locale_text: “死亡的仆人，她的目光越过了生与死的门槛！在旅途的终点，这只蜘蛛会迎来结茧的命运！”{n}伊迪拉摇了摇头，捂住了太阳穴。{/n}“抱……抱歉，那些话突然就冲口而出了，我应该没说什么太奇怪的话吧？”

languages.text: "Ein Diener des Todes, der über die Schwelle hinaussieht! Eine Spinne, die mit dem Ende seines Fadens einen Kokon spinnt!" {n}Idira schüttelt den Kopf und fasst sich an die Schläfen.{/n} "B-bitte verzeiht mir. Es kam einfach über mich. Ich habe doch nichts allzu Verrücktes gesagt, oder?"
languages.original_text: "A servant of death who sees beyond the threshold! A spider who spins a cocoon at the end of his thread!" {n}Idira shakes her head and clutches her temples.{/n} "S-sorry about that, it just came over me. I didn't say anything too weird, did I?"

traits.locale_text: "Ein Diener des Todes, der über die Schwelle hinaussieht! Eine Spinne, die mit dem Ende seines Fadens einen Kokon spinnt!" {n}Idira schüttelt den Kopf und fasst sich an die Schläfen.{/n} "B-bitte verzeiht mir. Es kam einfach über mich. Ich habe doch nichts allzu Verrücktes gesagt, oder?"

languages.text: « Un serviteur de la mort qui voit au-delà du seuil ! Une araignée qui tisse son cocon au bout de son fil ! » {n}Idira secoue la tête et porte les mains à ses tempes.{/n} « P-pardon, ça m'a échappé. Je n'ai rien dit de trop bizarre, au moins ? »
languages.original_text: "A servant of death who sees beyond the threshold! A spider who spins a cocoon at the end of his thread!" {n}Idira shakes her head and clutches her temples.{/n} "S-sorry about that, it just came over me. I didn't say anything too weird, did I?"

traits.locale_text: « Un serviteur de la mort qui voit au-delà du seuil ! Une araignée qui tisse son cocon au bout de son fil ! » {n}Idira secoue la tête et porte les mains à ses tempes.{/n} « P-pardon, ça m'a échappé. Je n'ai rien dit de trop bizarre, au moins ? »

languages.text: "Eşiğin ötesini görebilen bir ölüm hizmetkârı! İpliğinin bitişinde koza ören bir örümcek!" {n}İdira, kafasını sallayarak şakaklarını ovuşturuyor.{/n} "K... Kusuruma bakma. Bir anda geliverdi. Tuhaf bir şey demedim, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "A servant of death who sees beyond the threshold! A spider who spins a cocoon at the end of his thread!" {n}Idira shakes her head and clutches her temples.{/n} "S-sorry about that, it just came over me. I didn't say anything too weird, did I?"
